goal.ch: 本課程介紹財務與經濟數據的統計分析與預測方法，以時間數列資料為研究對象，課程內容涵蓋單變量與多變量的時間數列模型，包括ARMA模型、向量自我迴歸模型(vector autoregression model, VAR)、單根檢定方法、共整合分析 (cointegration)、ARCH/GARCH模型、馬可夫轉換模型(Markov switching model) 與混合頻率資料模型 (mixed frequency data analysis, MIDAS)。本課程將使用EViews與Python 讓學生練習來處理資料與使用模型來分析時間數列，並進行預測。
goal.en: This course focuses on the theoretical backgrounds of several important time series models. We will use EViews and Python for practicing and applying time series models on economic and financial data.  After successfully finishing this course, students are expected to understand basic and advanced time-series model and equip financial data analysis skills for estimation and forecasting.

outline.ch: 課程進度安排如下:1. ARMA模型之性質、估計方法及預測; 2. ARCH/GARCH模型之估計及預測; 3. 非恆定時間數列; 4. 單根檢定; 5. VAR模型之性質、估計及預測; 6. Cointegration模型之性質、檢定、與估計方法; 7. ARCH/GARCH模型之估計及預測; 8. 門檻迴歸模型 (Threshold regression model)
outline.en: Topics include:1. ARMA Model: Specification, Estimation , and Forecast, 2. ARCH/GARCH Mode, 3. Nonstationary Time Series,  4. Unit Root Test, 5. VAR Model, 6. Cointegration Mode, 7. ARCH/GARCH Models, 8. Threshold Regression Model
